text: Strive Masiyiwa (born 29 January 1961) is a London-based Zimbabwean billionaire businessman and philanthropist. == Education == Masiyiwa holds a bachelor's degree in electrical engineering from the University of Wales. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Zimbabwean businesspeople Category:African philanthropists Category:Billionaires
title: Strive Masiyiwa
